tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_data_deletion_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    request_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_data_deletion_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    request_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    action_taken VARCHAR(50),
    additional_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_data_deletion_audit_logs (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    audit_date TIMESTAMP,
    action_performed VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE UserData (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE user_personal_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255)
);
